Directions: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, rice, water chestnuts and green onions. In a small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, milk, lemon juice, salt, tarragon and pepper. Pour over chicken mixture; toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 2-3 hours. Just before serving, fold in grapes and sprinkle with cashews.
Ingredients: 2 1/2 cups cooked, cubed chicken breast meat
1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
